title: viewable-impressions
description: The advertising/viewability metric viewable-impressions describes the whether the ad has been deemed viewable by the viewability library. In video, measurement taken after two seconds of video play.

@id.description: The unique identifier of this metric.

schema:name.description: The human-readable name of the metric. The name can be used in user interfaces and does not have to be unique.

xdm:measurement.description: How to take measures of this metric.
